text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The candidate answer discusses several critical SHA provisions (Anti-Dilution, Liquidation Preference, Board Rights, Information Rights, Drag-Along, Tag-Along, Pro-Rata, Protective Provisions) relevant to a minority investor in a German GmbH.
